mav_sim.state_plotter.state_data module¶

state_data.py Stores the data for each state

class mav_sim.state_plotter.state_data.StateData(sigma_bounds: list[int] | None = None, max_length: int | None = None, is_angle: bool = False, rad2deg: bool = False)¶

Bases: object

Object for storing data for plots

Adds data to the storage

Returns the current sigma value
